item.title: Wat ik geleerd heb van starten als freelancer
item.description: Werken als freelancer in de IT

item.title: Here's 10 tips you wish you knew earlier to speed up your Mendix development
item.description: Pro tips for leveling up your development game within Mendix Studio Pro

Then comes the question of what in the hell am I going to do for a living? Writing code might be great but you don’t see yourself doing that all day long for the next forty years of your life, right? Those were my thoughts before I started working in low code, when I was approached with an offer to work as a business engineer. People who work in low code development are often referred to as business engineers.
